column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This museum is so impressive
column2: it really is world class. We got there at opening time and stayed for about 2.5 hours
column3: and we maybe got through 1/3 of the museum. I would've been happy exploring all day! We saw the Rembrandt exhibit
column6: and contemporary art sections. Our favorites were the impressionists/Monets
column8: and a Sunday Afternoon. We had no idea how many iconic pieces were in this museum
column9: including some of the Van Gogh pieces
column11: and many more! I can't wait to come back and look through all the other exhibits!
